name: Color Code - Board Game
description:
**************** Presentation ************
Bord game for 1 or 2 players. The goal is to break the code of the other player. You can play against the computer, with your friends or family on the same device or online with game center.

***************** Features ***************
The "Training" mode allows you to play against the computer.
Choose your options.

The "1 Player" mode allows you to play against the computer.
The difficulty increase progressively with levels.
The level which has been reached is preserved.

The "2 Players" mode allows you to play with someone on the same device.

The "Online" mode allows you to play with an other player connected on Game Center.
1 point is awarded to the winner.

************** In-App Purchases ***********
Remove all advertising from the game.
